questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Food and drink
D) Art and culture

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A sports event
B) A quiet street scene
C) A family gathering
D) A cozy tea or coffee time

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A landscape
C) Plates with cookies and a mug of frothy drink
D) A piece of art

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A cookie on a plate
D) A book

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A beach
B) A forest
C) A room with wooden flooring and a curtain
D) A street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) A table with plates and a mug
C) A car
D) A painting

What type of drink is likely in the mug?
A) Water
B) Juice
C) A frothy coffee or tea
D) Wine

A) Blue
B) White
C) Red
D) Green

What is the texture of the plates?
A) Smooth
B) Embossed with a floral pattern
C) Rough
D) Glossy

A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

A) A spoon
B) A piece of candy
C) A napkin
D) A book

B) Old and worn
C) Painted
D) Covered with a tablecloth

A) Black

D) Red

A) One
